Moved to Minor League Baseball as part of MiLB realignment; became New York Yankees Double-A affiliate.
Moved to Minor League Baseball as part of MiLB realignment; became Houston Astros Triple-A affiliate.
Replaced by the Spire City Ghost Hounds in Frederick, Maryland.
